entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming mainly sunny late in the morning.
